rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a North-facing orientation to welcome natural light and ventilation, following Vastu principles.
Open plan living area adjacent to the central courtyard for enhanced natural lighting and cross ventilation.
Integrated dining space with views of the courtyard, promoting social interaction.
Open-air central courtyard serving as a communal area that ensures ample natural light and ventilation throughout the farmhouse.
Modern kitchen with east-west orientation to harness morning sunlight while considering Vastu alignment, connected to service areas.
Compact living area for household staff, located near the kitchen and utility zones.
Dedicated home office with north-east orientation to promote productivity and positive energy, ensuring privacy from other areas.
Spacious master bedroom with east-facing windows for natural morning light, following Vastu guidelines.
One additional bedroom ensuring balanced layout and privacy.
